description: RecyclerView items holding large bitmaps causing memory issues. Combination of bitmap management and view recycling problems.
commonCauses: Loading full-resolution images for list items
solutions: Use Glide/Coil for automatic bitmap management
Set ImageView to null or placeholder in recycle
prevention: Always use Glide/Coil for RecyclerView images
Load images sized for display dimensions
Implement proper pagination for large lists
Test with long lists and scrolling
examples: override fun onBindViewHolder(holder: ViewHolder, position: Int) { Glide.with(holder.itemView).load(item.imageUrl).into(holder.imageView) }
